channel.title: Need help with making pictures
channel.description: hey there i need some help with making pictures on my server at serverstatus.php i got the files but how do i get them on moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php? plzzzz help

item.title: Need help with making pictures
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

This has nothing to do with server help, but ill help you anyway.
Go to a websitye like www.imageshack.com or www.tinypic.com then upload it. Once done, copy i think either the forum code, or the direct layout code, or maybe its just the basic one, (been awhile since i did this) and just paste it onto the serverstatus page.

Read full topic
